akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 107–110, title X, § 1011(4)(A), Jan. 8, 2002, 115 Stat. 1986

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 5871. Repealed. Pub. L. 107–110, title X, § 1011(4)(A), Jan. 8, 2002, 115 Stat. 1986
Section, Pub. L. 103–227, title II, § 241, Mar. 31, 1994, 108 Stat. 156; Pub. L. 104–134, title I, § 101(d) [title VII, § 701(3)], Apr. 26, 1996, 110 Stat. 1321–211, 1321–251; renumbered title I, Pub. L. 104–140, § 1(a), May 2, 1996, 110 Stat. 1327, authorized appropriations.
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Effective Date of RepealRepeal effective Jan. 8, 2002, except with respect to certain noncompetitive programs and competitive programs, see section 5 of Pub. L. 107–110, set out as an Effective Date note under section 6301 of this title.
